content:
* Discussion of the impact of the pandemic on arts organizations and their ability to fundraise
* Mention of data showing an increase in phone calls to donors and their impact on revenue and donor retention
* Importance of being authentic and transparent in fundraising efforts during the pandemic
* Mention of data showing a decline in retention rates among small and mid-sized organizations, but an increase among larger organizations
* Importance of staying in touch with donors and adapting fundraising strategies to fit the current climate
* Mention of increased use of virtual events and personalized video messaging
* Importance of understanding donor motivations and utilizing data to make informed decisions about fundraising strategies
* Advice for small and mid-sized organizations to focus on donor retention and building relationships with current donors rather than solely acquiring new donors
* Mention of the importance of storytelling and emotion in fundraising, particularly during the pandemic
